item.title: Random item
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

um i know how but it will either be you need to make a new java file or add it into one of your item.java’s file ill make a mini tut on adding it to a item.java just give me a minute[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2009, 12:40:25 pm[/size][hr]first step:go into item2.java and at the bottom
(not passed the very last bracket though)
add this[code] public static int Barrows[] = { 4708, 4710, 4712, 4714, 4724, 4726, 4728, 4730, 4732, 4734, 4736, 4738, 4745, 4747, 4749, 4751, 4753, 4755, 4757, 4759, 4716, 4718, 4720, 4722};

public static int randomBarrows() {
    return Barrows[(int) (Math.random() * Barrows.length)];
}[/code]

now save and close
second step:open client.java
and search case 132
then add if (objectID == (CHESTIDHERE)) { addItem(Item2.randomBarrows(), 1); }
save and compile now XD

notes:
i helped you buy personally searching every barrows piece i could think of if i missed one please tell me
well there are some things first if you get errors please post for i have not tested i only pulled out of my ass (but it may work)
where it has CHESTIDHERE replace that with the chest id cause i couldn’t find it
and ill try to help with any errors
thanks for reading
~ Demonnd

Read full topic
